name: Green Tomato Pizza
recipeYield: 1 large, 2 medium, or more smaller pizzas
keywords: green tomato, parmesan, pizza dough, main course, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup coarsely chopped or torn basil

recipeInstructions.text: Thinly slice tomatoes, salt lightly and let sit at least 20 minutes, then drain off any accumulated liquid.
Top pizza rounds with tomato slices and Parmesan. Bake about 10 minutes, or until nearly done. Sprinkle with basil and cook until done.
